Runtime error handler function declaration, must be implemented independently by each platform.

\subsection{Detailed Description}
Runtime error handler function declaration, must be implemented independently by each platform. 

\subsection{Function Documentation}
\hypertarget{error__handler_8h_a34f2e2ec0cc761f9d94e64ebc2d16030}{\index{error\-\_\-handler.\-h@{error\-\_\-handler.\-h}!Critical\-Error\-Handler@{Critical\-Error\-Handler}}
\index{Critical\-Error\-Handler@{Critical\-Error\-Handler}!error_handler.h@{error\-\_\-handler.\-h}}
\subsubsection[{Critical\-Error\-Handler}]{\setlength{\rightskip}{0pt plus 5cm}void Critical\-Error\-Handler (
\begin{DoxyParamCaption}
\item[{Hsp\-\_\-\-Status\-\_\-t}]{status, }
\item[{uint32\-\_\-t}]{context1, }
\item[{uint32\-\_\-t context2}]{\-\_\-\-\_\-\-D\-E\-C\-L\-\_\-\-D\-E\-B\-U\-G\-\_\-\-P\-A\-R\-A\-M\-E\-T\-E\-R\-S}
\end{DoxyParamCaption}
)}}\label{error__handler_8h_a34f2e2ec0cc761f9d94e64ebc2d16030}


Critical error handler. 

{\bfseries Description\-:} Critical error handler
\begin{DoxyItemize}
\item Called by main code when a non-\/recoverable error occurs.
\item Must be implemented indepdently for each supported platform.
\item Function must N\-O\-T return.
\end{DoxyItemize}


\begin{DoxyParams}{Parameters}
{\em status} & H\-S\-P status code representing the error that has occurred.\\
\hline
{\em context1} & First context value. This can be any user-\/supplied value relating to the error.\\
\hline
{\em context2} & Second context value. This can be any user-\/supplied value relating to the error.\\
\hline
{\em function} & D\-E\-B\-U\-G O\-N\-L\-Y -\/ Pointer to name of function that caused the error.\\
\hline
{\em file} & D\-E\-B\-U\-G O\-N\-L\-Y -\/ Pointer to source filename where error occurred.\\
\hline
{\em line} & D\-E\-B\-U\-G O\-N\-L\-Y -\/ Source line number where error occurred.\\
\hline
\end{DoxyParams}
\begin{DoxyReturn}{Returns}
void 
\end{DoxyReturn}
